basic_data.Description: APPLICATION PURPOSE: THE PROJECT WILL BE USED BY ASUCD-UNITRANS (WHICH IS A UNIT OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA-DAVIS AND SUB-RECIPIENT TO THE CITY OF DAVIS PROVIDING FIXED-ROUTE TRANSIT SERVICE FOR THE CITY OF DAVIS AND UC DAVIS) AND BY THE CITY OF DAVIS (FOR PARATRANSIT SERVICE).; ACTIVITIES PERFORMED: FUNDS FROM THIS AWARD WILL PROVIDE OPERATING ASSISTANCE FOR UNITRANS FY 2018 AND FY 2019 FIXED-ROUTE TRANSIT SERVICES AND CAPITAL ASSISTANCE FOR THE PURCHASE OF BUS ROLLING STOCK REPLACEMENTS FOR BOTH THE CITY OF DAVIS AND UNITRANS REHABILITATION OF 13 UNITRANS BUSES IMPROVEMENTS TO THE UNITRANS BUS MAINTENANCE FACILITY AND PURCHASE OF NEW AND REPLACEMENT EQUIPMENT USED TO OPERATE AND MAINTAIN UNITRANS SERVICES.; EXPECTED OUTCOMES: EXPECTED OUTCOMES INCLUDE CONTINUITY OF FIXED ROUTE AND PARATRANSIT BUS SERVICES IMPROVED SYSTEM RELIABILITY IMPROVED EFFICIENCY REDUCED OPERATING AND MAINTENANCE COSTS AND COMPLIANCE WITH ELECTRIC BUS CONVERSION REQUIREMENTS.; INTENDED BENEFICIARIES: INTENDED BENEFICIARIES INCLUDE RESIDENTS AND VISITORS TO THE CITY OF DAVIS THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA-DAVIS AND TRANSIT CUSTOMERS WHO WILL BENEFIT FROM CONTINUED SERVICE THAT IS RELIABLE AND MORE SUSTAINABLE.; SUBRECIPIENT ACTIVITIES: ALL ACTIVITIES EXCEPT FOR PARATRANSIT BUS REPLACEMENT WILL BE UNDERTAKEN BY THE CITYS SUB-RECIPIENT THE REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA THROUGH ASUCD-UNITRANS AN OPERATING UNIT OF UC DAVIS.

detailed_data.description: APPLICATION PURPOSE: THE PROJECT WILL BE USED BY ASUCD-UNITRANS (WHICH IS A UNIT OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA-DAVIS AND SUB-RECIPIENT TO THE CITY OF DAVIS PROVIDING FIXED-ROUTE TRANSIT SERVICE FOR THE CITY OF DAVIS AND UC DAVIS) AND BY THE CITY OF DAVIS (FOR PARATRANSIT SERVICE).; ACTIVITIES PERFORMED: FUNDS FROM THIS AWARD WILL PROVIDE OPERATING ASSISTANCE FOR UNITRANS FY 2018 AND FY 2019 FIXED-ROUTE TRANSIT SERVICES AND CAPITAL ASSISTANCE FOR THE PURCHASE OF BUS ROLLING STOCK REPLACEMENTS FOR BOTH THE CITY OF DAVIS AND UNITRANS REHABILITATION OF 13 UNITRANS BUSES IMPROVEMENTS TO THE UNITRANS BUS MAINTENANCE FACILITY AND PURCHASE OF NEW AND REPLACEMENT EQUIPMENT USED TO OPERATE AND MAINTAIN UNITRANS SERVICES.; EXPECTED OUTCOMES: EXPECTED OUTCOMES INCLUDE CONTINUITY OF FIXED ROUTE AND PARATRANSIT BUS SERVICES IMPROVED SYSTEM RELIABILITY IMPROVED EFFICIENCY REDUCED OPERATING AND MAINTENANCE COSTS AND COMPLIANCE WITH ELECTRIC BUS CONVERSION REQUIREMENTS.; INTENDED BENEFICIARIES: INTENDED BENEFICIARIES INCLUDE RESIDENTS AND VISITORS TO THE CITY OF DAVIS THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA-DAVIS AND TRANSIT CUSTOMERS WHO WILL BENEFIT FROM CONTINUED SERVICE THAT IS RELIABLE AND MORE SUSTAINABLE.; SUBRECIPIENT ACTIVITIES: ALL ACTIVITIES EXCEPT FOR PARATRANSIT BUS REPLACEMENT WILL BE UNDERTAKEN BY THE CITYS SUB-RECIPIENT THE REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA THROUGH ASUCD-UNITRANS AN OPERATING UNIT OF UC DAVIS.
